snippet: Peru will seek criminal charges against Greenpeace activists who damaged the world-renowned Nazca lines by leaving footprints in the adjacent desert during a publicity stunt, a senior government official said Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Peru Riled by Greenpeace Stunt at Nazca Lines
headline.main: Peru Riled by Greenpeace Stunt at Nazca Lines

lead_paragraph: Peru will seek criminal charges against Greenpeace activists who damaged the world-renowned Nazca lines by leaving footprints in the adjacent desert during a publicity stunt, a senior government official said Tuesday.
